title: dog_bedding_exposed_to_late_afternoon_sunlight
summary: Observation of dog bedding placed outdoors during late afternoon with sunlight still present.
description: This data unit documents dog bedding positioned outdoors in the late afternoon. Sunlight was still present at the time of capture, allowing continued drying. This condition differs from the previous day when sunlight was absent. Morning sun exposure and prior day weather conditions are referenced for comparison.

linked_references.note: Previous day bedding collection with no sunlight.

external_reference.note: Image shows dog bedding outdoors with sunlight present in late afternoon.
